report.title: Basic Instinct
report.author: Rangi
report.bodytext: T + 0:00 - oral 3 x .25mg /n /n T + 1:10 - feeling quite tired, has relieved any DT's /n /n T + 2:30 - Still feeling it, im notably slower than before. A nice doobie would go down pretty well about now. /n /n T + 4:00 -Mild Effects still felt, felt a little clumsy before /n might go lie down for a ciggie and some tv /n /n Went to sleep after smoking a cig.
